ModMetaData.name: Visible Raid Points
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPonyta
ModMetaData.description:
Ever wondered just how many points the game used to generate a raid? Are you getting the maximum 10,000 point raids yet? Now you'll know because you can see exactly how many raid points are used to generate every raid and many other types of incidents.
For an even more educational experience, you can also enable a threat points breakdown that shows the details of how the points were calculated, line by line. This option must be turned on in the mod settings first.
Spanish translation by Ferchu. Korean translation by PenguinsCanFly.
Note: The current version of this mod is no longer compatible with version 1.2 of the game. For a 1.2-compatible version of the mod with reduced functionality, you can download it from the "1.2-compatibility" branch on GitHub: https://github.com/1trickPonyta/VisibleRaidPoints/tree/1.2-compatibility
=== Updates === 08/26/2021: Added threat points breakdown feature. 08/09/2021: Added Korean translation. 08/06/2021: Enabled visible threat points for additional incident types including infestations, crashed ship parts, mechanoid clusters, manhunter packs, animal mass insanity, and caravan ambushes. Added Spanish translation.
